mapper.select:
SELECT id,title,resId,fromFlag,unifytype,size,timeline,time,imgpath,filesuffix from ( SELECT t.id ,t.resid,t.fromflag,CONCAT(t.downdate,' ',t.downtime)as time ,a.name as title,p.MType as unifyType,a.AssetSize as size,'' as timeline,a.AssetPath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(AssetPath),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(AssetPath))-1)) as fileSuffix,0 as orderIdx FROM z_resdown_record t LEFT JOIN z_asset a on a.id = t.resId LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = a.unifyTypeId WHERE t.userid = #{userId} and t.fromflag IN (1,2) and a.flag = FALSE and a.filetype = 'A'
UNION ALL select t.id ,t.resid,t.fromflag,CONCAT(t.downdate,' ',t.downtime)as time ,z.title,p.MType as unifyType,z.FSize as size,IFNULL(m.res_time,'') as timeline,CONCAT(z.FPath,'\\\\',z.Fname) as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(fname))-1)) as fileSuffix,0 as orderIdx FROM z_resdown_record t LEFT JOIN z_resource z on t.resid = z.Id LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = z.MType LEFT JOIN z_res_medium m on m.res_code = z.ResCode WHERE t.userid = #{userId} and t.fromflag= 0 and z.flag = FALSE
UNION ALL select t.id ,t.resid,t.fromflag,CONCAT(t.downdate,' ',t.downtime)as time ,r.title,p.MType as unifyType,r.FSize as size,'' as timeline,r.fullpath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(fname),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(fname))-1)) as fileSuffix,0 as orderIdx FROM z_resdown_record t LEFT JOIN z_districts_resource r on r.id = t.resid LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = r.unifyTypeId WHERE t.userid = #{userId} and t.fromflag in (3,4) )temp_result where 1 =1
and EXISTS ( select id from x_resourcetype where (id = #{unifyTypeId}>0 or pid = #{unifyTypeId}>0 )and flag =false and id = temp_result.unifyTypeId )
and EXISTS (select FormatCode from j_filetypedetail where flag = false and FileFormat =#{fileFormat} and FormatCode = CONCAT('.',temp_result.filesuffix))
ORDER BY time desc
